content.title: About
content.subtitle: Hi ğŸ‘‹ I'm Kooper, welcome to my website.
body: If you're just here for a quick visit, you might be more interested in browsing some of my weekend projects.
Initially created in July 2020 during my honours year, this site started from scratch as a hobby, secondary only to my studies. As I learned more, it ate more of my free time and continued to evolve.
Here's some information on what is being used to serve this website to you:

items: Domain registration and namespace mapping through GoDaddy ğŸ“
Servers are deployed and self-hosted on a VPS ğŸ–¥ï¸
Version control managed with git/Github ğŸ“†
SSL certification and monitoring via Cloudflare ğŸ•µï¸
SQLite (SQL) and MongoDB (NoSQL) as backends ğŸ’½
Flask, Golang and Rust as a middleware API servers ğŸ¤–
Frontend is written with React in Typescript ğŸ’„
http â†’ wsgi NGINX server as reverse proxy ğŸ§
